items.value:
If active, notebook/elevator counters
will have 'Notebooks' or 'Elevators' text
If active, sound event will have tinnitus effect
If active, play button will appear when generator crash
If active, you will be able see item descriptions when you hover them

If active, stockfish won't give item reward and will give punishment if you fail puzzle
Just like old Stockfish!
Options that can be only active or not active
